mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Reibelt, widow
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Refers to letter which husband wrote on Oct. 9, 1809; is widow with 5 children; needs help but doesn't want to complain to president; person to whom husband gave enclosure forgot to take it aboard; now sends it; 3 children born in U.S.; wishes to accomplish design of dead husband; flatters self Jefferson will help her.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1810 May 16, Havana, [Cuba] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
